name: When Witches Fly - 太陽が西から昇る
name_original: When Witches Fly - 太陽が西から昇る
description:
Dodge, deflect and defy fate. Isometric bullet hell action!

On her way to a tea party with her girlfriend, disaster strikes. Marisa's broom falls out of the sky and her mini-Hakkero disappears! As something indescribable takes Alice, its up to Marisa and a doll named Hakkero to get to her in:

Compatible with Keyboard + Mouse or Xbox One Controller
